briefTitle: Physical Activity Levels and Functional Improvement in Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: Do Physical Activity Levels Predict Functional Improvements Following a Structured Exercise Program for Women Living With Breast Cancer?
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Have received a diagnosis of breast cancer in your lifetime
* 19 years of age and older
* Cleared by medical team to participate in the study
* Have the intention to exercise at the facility for the duration of the study

Exclusion Criteria:

-
